statements: DELETE FROM travel_expenses WHERE date = '2022-07-15' AND category = 'Food';
DELETE FROM travel_expenses WHERE category = 'Food' AND amount > 50;
DELETE FROM receipts WHERE id = 10 AND amount > 100.50;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Unpaid' AND amount <= 500.00;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND date <= '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM invoices WHERE vendor = 'XYZ Corp' AND due_date < '2022-01-01';
